title: House for sale in Mahara Kadawatha
details:
Facing Colombo Kandy Road and within close proximity to popular schools, super Markets, Waking path, This unique home which gives a village atmosphere can definitely be called a home for those to love to have a peaceful living

Its within 2 km radius to both Kadawatha & Kiribathgoda town

It has large garden with a fully grown Coconuts trees, Mango, Jack fruit with neatly grown grass that makes a property an eye catcher, ideal for garden parties

The property has two entrances and has enough parking space for 6 cars

The house consist of 4 large rooms & 2 bathrooms with one attached bath

The house locks more spacious with large hall, large dining with a glittering tiled floor

It has spacious pantry and add values to the house the way it has being maintained
